title: GET_VEHICLE_PED_IS_IN
content:
0xAFE92319// GetVehiclePedIsIn
Vehicle GET_VEHICLE_PED_IS_IN(Ped ped, BOOL lastVehicle);Parameters:ped: The target pedlastVehicle: False = CurrentVehicle, True = LastVehicleReturns: The vehicle id. Returns 0 if the ped is/was not in a vehicle.Gets the vehicle the specified Ped is/was in depending on bool value. This native is used server side when using OneSync.
codeBlocks:
// GetVehiclePedIsIn
Vehicle GET_VEHICLE_PED_IS_IN(Ped ped, BOOL lastVehicle);
